Package edu.rit.m2mi.life3

Package edu.rit.m2mi.life3 is a program for John Horton Conway's Game of Life using M2MI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LifeCell Interface LifeCell specifies the interface for an exported object that encapsulates a cell in the Game of Life (version 3).
LifeCellListener Interface LifeCellListener specifies the interface for an exported object that listens to cell state reports in the Game of Life (version 3).
LifeController Interface LifeController specifies the interface for an object that controls the computation in the Game of Life (version 3).
 

Class Summary
Life Class Life is the main program for the Game of Life (version 3).
LifeButton Class LifeButton encapsulates the UI for one cell in the Game of Life (version 3).
LifeCellImpl Class LifeCellImpl encapsulates a cell in the Game of Life (version 3).
LifeControllerImpl Class LifeController encapsulates the UI for controlling the computation in the Game of Life (version 3).
LifePanel Class LifePanel encapsulates the UI for a grid of cells in the Game of Life (version 3).
 

Package edu.rit.m2mi.life3 Description

Package edu.rit.m2mi.life3 is a program for John Horton Conway's Game of Life using M2MI. Class Life is the main program. To run the program, execute this command, specifying the desired number of rows and columns (16 by 16 in this example):

java edu.rit.m2mi.life3.Life 16 16

The program displays a GUI:

Click on a cell to toggle the cell between live and dead. Click on the Start, Stop, Step, and Reset buttons to control the simulation.

By default, cells in the top row are adjacent to cells in the bottom row, and cells in the left column are adjacent to cells in the right column (toroidal topology). Specify the -p flag to make opposite edges not adjacent (planar topology):

java edu.rit.m2mi.life3.Life -p 16 16

M2MI Library Version 02-Jul-2002
